aya wiwiyan da silwa boralassa nam wanniya.1930 wasare nowambar 24 wani dina upatha lada wiwiyan miya yana wita 87 hawiridi wiya sampurna karannata sudanam wa sitiyaya.aya gi gayanaya ek wana wita merata githa kshethreyahi kanthawan nowu tharamya.kanthawan kala lokayata adi eema ekala nohobina deyakayi wadihitiyo kalpana kalaha.eheth wiwiyan ee athin wasanawantha wiya.aya ge piya ewakata maradane siti bas ratha wyaparikayaku wiyawiya.ohu tawar rangahalata da sambandha kam thibina.natyaya nispadanaye da yedina.boho natyaya puhunu wuwe da wiwiyanlage niwasemaya.siya diyaniyage gayana hakiyawa wataha gath thaththa age diwiyata aruthak gena dunneya.ekala gayakayeku saha sangithagnyayaku wana ji.aar.edwad aya ge mama keneku wiya.thaththage upakarayen mama samaga mulma giya aya guwan widuliyata gayana wita wayasa awurudu dahayaki.egoda gode gan iwure ema githayayi.aya ge mulma sarala githaya wuye chandra de shriya nam wiya.eheth aya wadath prachalitha wanne bodu bathi gi gayanayath samangaya.

juli masa 31 wana dina, kuja dina rathri 07 pasuwi winadi 50 ta dakunu dishabhimukhawa perahara pitathwa dalada widiya (wodwidiya) yatinuwara widiya, haras widiya, kotugodalla widiya kande widiya, di.es. senanayaka widiya (thrikunamala widiya), osse rajawidiyen ihalatawith gewadima.agosthu masa 01 wana dina, buda dina rathri 08 pasuwi winadi 24 ta dakunu dishabhimukhawa perahara pitathwa dalada widiya (wodwidiya) yatinuwara widiya, kande widiya (hil widiya) di.es.senanayaka widiya (thrikunamala widiya), osse rajawidiyen ihalatawith gewadima.2012 agosthu masa 01 wana buda dina rathri 01.00 pasuwi 43 ta dakunu dishabhimukhawa shri danthadhathu mandirayehi perahara siwdewalayanhi peraharath samanga pitathwa dalada widiya (wodwidiya), di.es. senanayaka widiya (thrikunamala widiya) osse gedige wiharayata (aadahana maluwata) gos sirith prakara dalada karanduwa ehi thanpath kota siwdewalayanhi perahara aapasu dewalawalata pamina dewapuja pawathwimen pasu katukale widiya dige gatambae thotata gos diya kapime mangalothsawaya sidukota aapasu ganadewi kowilata pamina dewa pujawa itu kirimada,2012 agosthu masa 02 wani dina guru dina dawal 11 pasuwi winadi 55 ta wayambaa dishabhimukhawa ganadewi kowilen perahara pitathwa katukale widiya,dalada widiya, ee.el. senanayaka widiya (kotugodalla widiya) kande widiya (hil widiya) osse di.es.senanayaka widiye (thrikunamala widiye), mansandhiyata pamina edina sawasa 01 pasuwi winadi 18 ta wayambaa dishabhimukhawa (aadahana maluwa) gedige wiharayen pitathwana shri danthadhathu mandiraye perahara katuwa, di.es.senanayaka widiya (thrikunamala widiya) pansala para, osse dewa widiyen, rajawidiyata hari maliga chathurashraye thewitak pradakshinakota sawasa 03 pasuwi winadi 42 ta wayambaa bala gewadima shubha we.
